I design and build human interfaces. I speculate on markets and ideas. Owner at Deltabadger – a dollar-cost averaging bot for Bitcoin investors. Previously, a UX Designer at Luna visual-textual programming language, Brown Brothers Harriman, and many smaller projects. Talk to me about singularity, dataism, and huskies.
